title: LA County COVID-19 Vaccine
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Vaccine COVID-19 Vaccine Vaccines are free. Immigration status and insurance are not required. NOW AVAILABLE: UPDATED VACCINES FOR ADULTS AND CHILDREN 6 MONTHS+ [CLICK HERE TO FIND A VACCINE LOCATION NEAR YOU](http://publichealth.lacounty.gov/acd/ncorona2019/vaccine/hcwsignup/?dosesNew=TRUE) For assistance or to request free transportation or [in-home vaccination](http://publichealth.lacounty.gov/acd/ncorona2019/vaccine/vaxathome/) call . The Public Health Call Center is open from 8:00am to 8:30pm 7 days a week. 1-833-540-0473 Vaccination Records Instructions on how to access your digital COVID-19 vaccine record. Newsletter Signup: Receive updates about In-Home COVID-19 Vaccines Available A flyer that explains how to get a vaccine if you have difficulty leaving your home. [English](docs/inhome/HomeboundVaccines.pdf) | [](docs/inhome/HomeboundVaccines-Arabic.pdf) | [](docs/inhome/HomeboundVaccines-Armenian.pdf) | [](docs/inhome/HomeboundVaccines-Cambodian.pdf) | [](docs/inhome/HomeboundVaccines-SimplifiedChinese.pdf) | this site were created using Adobe Acrobat 5.0 or later. Document functionality may be reduced if you are using an earlier version (4.x or less). [Get the latest version of Adobe Acrobat.](http://get.adobe.com/reader/otherversions/) Public Health has made reasonable efforts to provide accurate translation. However, no computerized translation is perfect and is not intended to replace traditional translation methods. If questions arise concerning the accuracy of the information, please refer to the English edition of the website, which is the official version.
